name: graidgenie-integrated
description: Integrated GraidGenie.com and Irish LC Demo platform

scripts.build:integrated: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:demo && npm run combine:builds
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.build:demo: cd ui && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.combine:builds: npm run setup:dist && npm run copy:frontend && npm run copy:demo
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../ui && npm install
